comment_0: It is about being hurt in the past and having bad relationships, so she was scared to trust. Then came along the one person who climbed the wall, the one she fell in love with. It is about finding the one you love, the one you never want to take your eyes off of...
comment_1: This is by far the most intimate and sexy song I've ever heard!  I love it!  The key change and few bars following are amazing. I'll be surprised if this is not a huge hit.
comment_2: Beautiful. It reminds me of a the first time you fall in love, your SO in to that person. Everything feels so new and so good even if you were scared to love before, when they hold you it feels so good you just want to stay there in that moment forever. I love this song.
comment_3: I'm surprised that not many people know how beautiful this song is. Seriously. It could sit on loop all day in my room, I'd never get sick of it. Along with the rest of Lady Antebellum's songs. (:
comment_4: This was me and my husband first dance song at our wedding... It was so beautiful. We got so many complements about it. Such a wonderful pick
